admreg: East Asia and Pacific,East Asia and Pacific
subsc: Central government administration,Other social services,General industry and trade sector,Forestry
trustfund:
TF027863-STRUCTURAL ADJUSTMENT CREDIT
            CO-FINANCING TRUST FUND

abstracts.cdata!:
The Structural Adjustment Credit aims to
            help push forward the Government reform program in the
            following areas. First, the SAC program aims to assist in
            improving public resource management which includes resource
            mobilization and forestry management. Second, it will assist
            in enhancing public sector management which comprises
            expenditure rationalization and preparatory steps for
            military demobilization and administrative reform. Third, it
            will assist in formulating a strategy on enhancing
            governance and fighting corruption in economic management
            and implementing. The main benefits of the credit is that it
            will assist the Government in making a successful transition
            toward sustainable development with significant poverty
            reduction and broad-based economic growth. Furthermore,
            Cambodia will improve enabling environment for private
            sector development through tackling governance problems. The
            program will also contribute to improving the access of poor
            households to basic social and economic services such as
            basic education, health facilities, etc. The risks
            concerning SAC implementation include: deterioration in
            political stability; insufficient political will; weak
            institutional capacity; and weak governance.
